English: What kind of facility are you installing Kolibri in?

English: Homeschooling, supplementary individual learning, and other informal use

ìdá òǹkà *t'ó jẹ́ tàbí tó ju ọ̀kan lọ*, bíi $10/7$ or $14/8$
òǹkà kan, bíi $6$

Yoruba: Ṣé o gbàgbé láti forúkọsílẹ̀ wọlé?

English: You must be signed in as a learner to view this page
Yoruba: O gbọdọ̀ forúkọsílẹ̀-wọlé bíi akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ láti wo ojú-ewé yíì

English: You must be signed in to view this page
Yoruba: O gbọdọ̀ ti forúkọsílẹ̀-wọlé láti wo ojú-ewé yíì
Kò sí olùkọ́ kankan
Kò sí akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kankan

English: The network address can be an IP and port like '192.168.0.100:8080' or a URL like 'example.com':
Yoruba: Ojúlé ìṣàsopọ̀ le jẹ́ IP àti ihòìsopọ̀araẹ̀rọ bí i '192.168.0.100:8080' tàbí URL bí i 'example.com':

English: The first thing you should do is import some channels to this device.
Yoruba: Ohun àkọ́kọ́ tí ó yẹ kí o ṣe ni pé kí o kó àwọn ìkànnì sórí ẹ̀rọ yìí.

English: The first thing you should do is import some resources from the Channels tab.
Yoruba: Ohun àkọ́kọ́ tí ó yẹ kí o ṣe ni pé kí o kó àwọn ohun àmúlò ìrànlọ́wọ́ wọlé láti ìpín ojú ewé Ìkànnì.
